casebody.data:
Ernest R. WHOLAVER, Jr., Petitioner
v.
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Governor Tom Wolf, Middletown Police Department, Chief John T. Bey, Dauphin County Sheriff's Office, Nicholas Chimienti, Jr., and Dauphin County District Attorney's Office, Edward M. Marsico, Jr., Respondents No. 303 MAL 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. November 16, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 16th day of November, 2018, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is DENIED.
